search.query: `cs_sysmon_deploy_audit_data` "*No updates found*" | dedup host | table host | eval ta_sysmon_deploy_status="Updated" | append [| tstats count where `cs_sysmon` by host | table host | eval data="Present"] | stats first(*) as * by host | fillnull data value="Absent" | fillnull ta_sysmon_deploy_status value="-" | sort ta_sysmon_deploy_status, data | table host, ta_sysmon_deploy_status, data

html.p: Search tries to check last 24 hours of data to find the status of Sysmon deployment.
Click on any host to get Sysmon deloyment status events for troubleshooting.
